response.original_title: Serial Killer Serial Liar Levi Bellfield: A Faking It Special
response.overview: Investigates the crimes and confessions of Levi Bellfield, a convicted serial killer. His 2023 claim of being the killer in the 1996 Lin Russell and Megan Russell case prompts
